# conv

Type conversions

| Operation  | Description
|------------|---------------
| [`coeff`](#coeff) | TODO
| [`dec`](#dec) | Decimal number


## coeff



	( p0:Decimal -- BigInt )


## dec

Pops *p0* from the stack and formats it as a `Decimal`.

	( p0:Decimal -- Decimal )
	( p0:Float -- Decimal )
	( p0:Rational -- Decimal )

Example:

<!-- test: dec -->

| Input     | Stack
|-----------|---------------
| `1e3 dec` | `1000`
